member.summary: Clears all buffers this instance manages.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstAudioBufferManager.ClearBuffer(Jacobi.Vst.Core.VstAudioBuffer)

member.summary: Retrieves the buffers objects, one for each buffer.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstAudioBufferManager.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the instance and free's the unmanaged memory.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstAudioBufferManager.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance for the specified number and size of buffers.
member.param: The number of buffers.
The size of a single buffer.

member.name: T:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstAudioBufferManager
member.summary: The VstAudioBufferManager class manages one continues block of unmanaged memory to service a number of audio buffers.
member.remarks: The class is instantiated specifying the number and size of buffers that can be accessed using the property. The life time of the unmanaged memory that backs up the buffers is coupled to the life time of the VstAudioBufferManager instance. Calling the method will free the unmanaged memory.

member.summary: Copies the new values from the unmanaged Vst2Plugin structure to the property.

member.remarks: All property names will be prefixed with 'PluginInfo.' to indicate the path to the property.

member.name: T:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstUnmanagedPluginContext

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstPluginContext.ShellCreate(Jacobi.Vst.Core.Host.IVstHostCommandStub)
member.summary: Creates a context for s sub-plugin from an *unmanaged* shell plugin (this).
member.param: A reference to a host supplied implementation of the host command stub. Must not be null.
member.remarks: The 's GetCurrentPluginID() method MUST return one of the unique plugin IDs that were retrieved by calling the method.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstPluginContext.Create(System.String,Jacobi.Vst.Core.Host.IVstHostCommandStub)
member.summary: Creates a context using the specified and .
member.param: The full path to a plugin .dll. Must not be null or empty.
A reference to a host supplied implementation of the host command stub. Must not be null.
member.remarks: Note that when the implements it is also disposed when this instance of the plugin context is disposed.
member.exception: Thrown when the file specified in does not exist.
Thrown when the library cannot be opened.
Thrown when the library does not expose a VSTPluginMain exported function.
Thrown when the library does not return an ::EAffect pointer from its exported main function.
Thrown when the library does not specify the correct magic number in the ::EAffect structure.

member.name: T:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstPluginContext
member.summary: The VstPluginContext class represents a VST Plugin for the host.
member.remarks:
The VstPluginContext can only be created using the static
factory method. The method accepts the path to the plugin and an implementation of the interface. Note that Open is not called on the Plugin by the context but it does call Close on the plugin when the context is disposed.

member.name: T:Jacobi.Vst.Interop.MemoryTracker
member.summary: The MemoryTracker class maintains a list of native allocated objects that can be deleted (freed) at another time.

member.name: T:Jacobi.Vst.Host.Interop.VstAudioPrecisionBufferManager
member.summary: The VstAudioPrecisionBufferManager class manages one continues block of unmanaged memory to service a number of audio buffers.
member.remarks: The class is instantiated specifying the number and size of buffers that can be accessed using the property. The life time of the unmanaged memory that backs up the buffers is coupled to the life time of the VstAudioPrecisionBufferManager instance. Calling the method will free the unmanaged memory.
